itrelated.division: Information and Communications Technology Group – Application Management Division
duties: Provide technical assistance and support on troubleshooting and maintaining ICT applications to ensure service continuity;
Assist in the daily administration of the application server and systems backup to ensure the service availability;
Conducts research and recommends innovative approaches for ICT applications administration to improve the service provisioning; and
Perform other functions as may be assigned by the Application Management Division (AMD) Chief from time to time.

itrelated.division: Information and Communications Technology Group – Application Management Division
duties: Provide support in the enhancement of the applications/modules of the Integrated Corporate Reporting System (ICRS) based on defined specifications;
Contribute in the enhancement of GCG internal applications/modules based on defined specifications;
Integrate software component(s) or module(s) into a fully functional software system;
Ensure the developed program meets all requirements of quality, security, modifiability, and extensibility;
Conduct periodical code testing to ensure that the desirable results of the application are met and perform debugging if necessary;
Prepare required documentations, including both program-level and user-level for both External and Internal Applications of GCG; and
Perform other functions that may be assigned from time to time by the Application Management Division (AMD) Chief.
Contributed in the development of a new SaaS (Software as a Service) application using latest technology and new software development methodology;
Assisted the On-the-Job Trainees on their activities during their OJT in Note-e-fied Phils., Inc.;
Enhanced the modules of the existing issue tracking system utilized by the Web Developers, SQA, and Software Support Specialists;
Ensured that the enhancement made to application meets all the requirements specified by the end-user;
Coordinated with the Software Quality Assurance for any identified issues on the developed and enhanced applications; and
Maintained existing applications and performed debugging when needed.
Provided support to customers by resolving concerns and inquiries in accordance to the company standards;
Documented the reported concerns/issues of the customer and forwarded it to the appropriate officer/staff for their review and appropriate action;
Resolved issues that occured during the processing of claim submission of Home Health and Hospice Agencies;
Assisted the Home Health and Hospice Agencies in the enrollment to the Medicare Direct Data Entry (DDE) through the Ability Network; and
Monitored the enrollment and cancellation of Home Health and Hospice Agencies to the Medicare DDE.
Taught both core and elective subjects in the field specialization as allocated by the Head of the Program offered by the University;
Conducted laboratory courses, tutorials and seminars of the subject assigned in an effective manner, so as to improve the practical knowledge of the student; and
Provided the core/elective subject as project based / experimental / activity-based learning.
Conducted basic to intermediate Website Designing class particularly in the usage of Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS); and
Discussed and taught basic to intermediate knowledge on Microsoft Office Applications (e.g. Word, PowerPoint, Excel, etc.).
Ensured that the interviews conducted are done with the highest level of quality by properly administering each survey without falsification of data and bias;
Performed survey research by using proper interviewing techniques and adhering to strict methodologies and guidelines;
Recorded respondent’s answers with 100% accuracy, including typing respondent’s verbal answers in verbatim to survey questions and meet assigned quota for survey collection; and
Promoted and provided extraordinary guest service for both internal and external guests; answered questions, offered information, and helped in a courteous manner.

otherjob.position: Seasonal Sales and Customer Service Representative
otherjob.company: Cyber City Teleservices, Inc. an IQOR Company
duties: Identified, qualified, prepared, and executed effective sales strategies that maintain the existing base of business and support the close of competitive and revenue growth opportunities;
Mastered all products and applications by demonstrating ongoing competency;
Maintained and increased sales volume within assigned accounts and territory;
Assisted customers with back-orders and other related service issues;
Answered incoming phone calls and inquiries. Routed calls and messages within the management system to appropriate staff; and
Resolved customer complaints in accordance with Company Policy and advised sales management promptly of any situation beyond the Sales Representative’s Authority.
